message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'd like to propose $10,500. Would you be willing to accept that price?
